summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements by adding comprehensive documentation and code comments that display the admin role implementation in both backend and frontend code. The backend shows admin role checking through the getAdminRole query function, and the frontend demonstrates conditional rendering based on admin status using the useIsCallerAdmin hook with detailed inline documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new migration.mo file with migration scaffolding
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Do not modify any existing code - only display/document the current implementation' and this adds a new file that was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented actual attribute template import functionality with file upload, progress tracking, and backend integration
hallucinated_features.reason: The request was only to display/document how admin role checking works for the import feature, not to implement the import feature itself. The BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Adding new admin features' is not a goal

hallucinated_features.description: Added SparePartAdvancedSearch component with full search functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest. The request was specifically focused on displaying admin role implementation, not implementing search features

hallucinated_features.description: Added comprehensive query hooks including useSearchSparePartsAdvanced, useGetNouns, useGetModifiers, and other cataloguing-related hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: These hooks implement new functionality rather than just documenting existing admin role checking as requested
